tags: so I figured I'd only post BTS from Christmas episodes
so Merry Christmas in a few days!
summary:
Behind the Scenes of The Next Doctor (Part Seven)

  

Excerpt from David Bailey’s behind-the-scenes report in DWM #404

 ...
caption:
Behind the Scenes of The Next Doctor (Part Seven)

Excerpt from David Bailey’s behind-the-scenes report in DWM #404

Russell T. Davies [writer, showrunner] says of David Morrissey: “What the Doctor says is true - all that bravery and invention is genuinely Jackson’s.  David M gets so much complexity out of all that. I particularly love the scenes in the Reverend Fairchild’s house, where there’s so much worry in his eyes. He’s sort of lost, and almost tearful. That’s a man who knows he isn’t well. He’s not lying, but is living a lie. And yet so many of his fake attributes are actually true. Blimey, d’you see how many layers there are to Jackson Like?! That takes one hell of a performance. I think if David M hadn’t been free, we might just as well have called the whole thing off.”

“We were just very chuffed to get him, really,” David T[ennant] adds of his namesake. “I know we tried to get him for some other parts, earlier this year, and it hadn’t worked out, so I’m just delighted that he happened to be free for this.”

So, just for a few months, it looked possible that David Morrissey - one of the UK’s most respected actors - was lined up to play ‘the next Doctor.’  It didn’t truly come to pass, but that needn’t be the end of the matter. Fans with long memories and tatty birth certificates (or a copy of Destiny of the Daleks on DVD) will, of course, remember the Doctor’s Time Lord companion Romana’s curious regeneration.  After trying on a few new bodies, she eventually settled into the lovely form of Princess Astra, someone the Doctor and she had met just one story earlier. Now, are you thinking what I’m thinking, Mr. Tennant?

“I don’t know if David would want to commit to anything more than this,” he laughs. “He may be quite happy. You’d have to ask him, really.”

So we did

“I’ve learnt in life that I never make any decisions about things until they become reality,” says David M, thoughtfully. That isn’t a no…

Other The Next Doctor parts available [one] [two] [three] [four] [five] [six]
[ Other behind-the-scenes photosets are available here ]

He’s not lying, but is living a lie. And yet so many of his fake attributes are actually true. Blimey, d’you see how many layers there are to Jackson Like?! That takes one hell of a performance. summary: Today's F'Art Friday is a Scrooge McDuck 10th Doctor  mashup. I got David to sign it at Rose City Comic Con 2018. I also worked...
body:
Today’s F'Art Friday is a Scrooge McDuck 10th Doctor mashup. I got David to sign it at Rose City Comic Con 2018. I also worked that con and was lucky enough to get to work David’s autograph booth.

Oh, and if you haven’t yet, watch the Duck Tales holiday special. There’s a fun Doctor Who nod in it that made me smile.

Happy holidays everyone!

reblog.comment:

Happy holidays everyone!
trail.content:
Today’s F'Art Friday is a Scrooge McDuck 10th Doctor mashup. I got David to sign it at Rose City Comic Con 2018. I also worked that con and was lucky enough to get to work David’s autograph booth.

Oh, and if you haven’t yet, watch the Duck Tales holiday special. There’s a fun Doctor Who nod in it that made me smile.

Happy holidays everyone!

tags: happy holidays from hardy and hannah
I hope you have a fantastic holiday
summary: “Happy Holidays from Hardy and Hannah” - Digital Oil Painting  I love alliteration! ^_^ Been a while since I last painted our...
caption:
“Happy Holidays from Hardy and Hannah” - Digital Oil Painting

I love alliteration! ^_^ Been a while since I last painted our favorite awkward turtle DI and his sexy but secretly dorky girlfriend. You just KNOW that Hannah talked him into wearing this to an ugly holiday sweater party (she’s wearing very high heels to be closer to his height) and then she sent out the picture as a holiday card. He’ll have to work very hard to be taken seriously at the precinct after that. LOL Happy holidays!

Please check the notes for my links, bear in mind that reblogs are very important while tumblr has links killed.
